text: Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere. Everybody's gonna die. Come watch TV.
author: Morty Smith

text: Don't be a sheep. You got to make your own decisions in this life.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: Weddings are basically funerals with cake.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: Sometimes science is a lot more art than science. A lot of people don't get that.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: Listen, Morty, I hate to break it to you, but what people call 'love' is just a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed
author: Rick Sanchez

text: What, so everyone's supposed to sleep every single night now? You realize that nighttime makes up half of all time?
author: Rick Sanchez

text: Having a family doesn't mean that you stop being an individual. You know the best thing you can do for the people that depend on you? Be honest with them, even if it means setting them free.
author: Mr. Poopybutthole

text: The universe is a cruel, uncaring void. The key to being happy isn't a search for meaning. It's to just keep yourself busy with unimportant nonsense, and eventually, you'll be dead.
author: Mr. Peanutbutter

text: We all have bad days, but we don't have to make other people's days worse.
author: Summer Smith

text: I'm not looking for judgement, just a yes or no. Can you assimilate a giraffe?
author: Rick Sanchez

text: I don't think we can repair it, but we can make it work.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: To live is to risk it all. Otherwise, you're just an inert chunk of randomly assembled molecules drifting wherever the universe blows you.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: The universe is infinite. It's vast and complex and ridiculous. And sometimes, very rarely, impossible things just happen and we call them miracles.
author: Doofus Rick

text: I'm not a thing! I'm a being! All beings are free to exist or not exist!
author: Mr. Meeseeks

text: I'm sorry, but your opinion means very little to me.
author: Rick Sanchez

text: You have to do it for yourself. If you're doing it for someone else, it's not gonna work.
author: Jerry Smith

text: You know, sometimes I think all men are born stupid and grow out of it, but no, no, no, not you.
author: Summer Smith
